rows.label: tlk70000046_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Turns out Jelyco was deadly serious
about wiping out the Bloody Lobsters.

rows.label: tlk70000046_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I tried to tell him that I'm done
with all that. Besides, it's literally
suicidal.

rows.label: tlk70000046_05_msg0003
rows.name:
But he just responded by giving me
this twelve-step fitness regimen and
telling me to shape up.

rows.label: tlk70000046_05_msg0004
rows.name:
He's a scary bloke. If it's all some kind
of joke, it's not funny. If he's serious...
well, there are better ways to do things.

rows.label: tlk70000046_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Does he really expect me to atone for
my crimes this way? Ask him again for
me, would you? I'm just not buying it...
